荀.definition: (archaic) name of a plant mentioned in ancient texts; name of a state that existed during the Zhou dynasty in present-day Shanxi

荀子.definition: Xunzi, (c. 310-237 BC), Confucian philosopher; the Xunzi, a collection of philosophical writings attributed to Xunzi

荀彧.definition: Xun Yu (163-212), brilliant strategist, advisor of Cao Cao in Three Kingdoms
